body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, undertaker. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Son of Peter Pearson and Susan Crow Pearson. Married to Mary A. Duhurst in 1842. Father of E.C Pearson, L.D. Pearson Jr., George E. Pearson, Emma L. Pearson Steinberg, Kate Pearson, Leila A. Pearson Pelouze. Cabinet maker in Louisville from 1831 to 1833. Undertaker in Louisville from 1833 to 1902. Employed by J.V.W. Smith from 1833 to 1848.
